sentences.sContent: Morals tend to be deeply ingrained.
sentences.sCn: 道德观念往往是根深蒂固的。

synos.tran: 根深蒂固的；彻头彻尾的；生染的

remMethod.val: in(进入) + grain(木头的纹理) + ed → 进入纹理之内 → 根深蒂固的

words.tran: 生染的；原纱染色的；根深蒂固的
固有品质；原纱染色；生染的纤维
使…根深蒂固；就…原料染色；生染

trans.tranOther: ingrained attitudes or behaviour are firmly established and therefore difficult to change
